item.title: How to install Ubuntu 20.04 on Hyper-V with enhanced session
item.author: Author
item.description: A few days ago Canonical officially released the latest version of Ubuntu. The first of the two releases of 2020 marks a new long term support (LTS). This post aims at configuring an Hyper-V virtual machine running Ubuntu 20.04 desktop with enhanced session enabled. At the time of writing this the Hyper-V wizard of Windows 10 1909 supports Ubuntu 18.04 and 19.10, but we can easily bypass this limitation by installing the tools manually.
